answers.answer: Yes, the symptoms you describe are all typical symptoms of diabetes. The thirst is the most common. That does sound like the most probable cause -- I heartily recommend that you get your glucose levels checked. Diabetes can be treated and you will feel much better after starting treatment. Delay can seriously damage your health.

question: I have been having problems medically for a while now. I was told it could be type 1 diabetes. my symptoms include:*increased appetite*insatiable thirst*increase in urination/frequency*soars not healing welli know this symptoms could point to diabetes, but can this fit any other medical problems?
